DOC.brief_title: Policy Practice : Statewide Rollout YMCA Childhood Obesity Standards

These include policy environment national , state local level ; characteristic individual site , program leadership , staff , child ; exist outside organizational partnership . This framework inform complex system change , social ecology , systemic capacity building , literature impact public health policy identifies key element system target well possible influence element . Viewing OST program complex system , `` Healthy Eating Physical Activity Standards '' represent one many leverage point within system . Existing effort implement standard rest solely upon voluntary adoption standard , little change OST program setting . It clear preliminary work comprehensive review OST program fall short meeting goal set forth standard .
